tool_description: DevAPI Finance provides real-time stock, options, news, and exchange data.  Including data from NYSE, NASDAQ, CBOE, HKEX, TSE, and more!
name: DevAPI Finance
title: DevAPI Finance

api_list.name: v2/ticker-summary
api_list.description: Get ticker market summary such as price range, marketCap, P/E, earnings and more!

required_parameters.name: ticker
required_parameters.description: Enter a company ticker symbol. Example: `AAPL`

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Enter one of the following assetClass: `STOCKS` or `ETF` or `MUTUALFUNDS` or `FUTURES`.

api_list.name: v2/market/tickers
api_list.description: Get ticker symbols for stocks traded in the U.S exchange.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Enter one of the following assetClass: `STOCKS` or `ETF` or `MUTUALFUNDS` or `FUTURES`.

api_list.name: v2/markets/news
api_list.description: Get market news and press releases for a given company.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Enter one of the following types: `ALL` or `VIDEO` or `PRESS_RELEASE`

optional_parameters.name: ticker
optional_parameters.description: Enter a company ticker symbol. Example: `AAPL`

api_list.name: v1/most-active
api_list.description: Get Stocks, ETFs, and Indices with the most option activity on the day, with IV Rank and Put/Call ratio.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Enter one of the following assetClass: `STOCKs ` or `ETFS ` or `INDICES `.

api_list.name: v1/unusual-options-activity
api_list.description: Unusual Options Activity identifies options contracts that are trading at a higher volume relative to the contract's open interest. Unusual Options can provide insight on what "smart money" is doing with large volume orders, signaling new positions and potentially a big move in the underlying asset.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Enter one of the following assetClass: `STOCKs ` or `ETFS ` or `INDICES `.

api_list.name: v2/movers
api_list.description: Get market movers in today's trading session.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Enter one of the following assetClass: `STOCKS` or `ETF` or `MUTUALFUNDS` or `FUTURES`.

api_list.name: v2/search
api_list.description: Get tickers for any stock comapny, ETF, mutualFund, crypto and more.

required_parameters.name: search
required_parameters.description: Enter a search term. Example: `AA`

api_list.name: v2/investing-strategies
api_list.description: Get a list of investing opportunities based on price action and other technical indicators

required_parameters.name: filter
required_parameters.description:
Available options:
- `hot_stocks` High-performing stocks with a BUY rating and robust technical analysis support, indicating a strong and potential upward trend.
- `top_under_10` Stocks priced under $10 with strong Price/Earnings and Price/Sales ratios.
- `dividend` Dividend-paying stocks showing bullish signals and exhibiting strong momentum.
- `j_pattern` Stocks with J-Hook pattern - up-trending price action that takes a little dip before resuming the trend.
- `golden_cross` Stocks experiencing a bullish signal as their 50-day moving average crosses above the 200-day moving average today.
- death_cross: Stocks experiencing a bearish signal as their 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average today.
- `consolidation` Stocks in a strong uptrend consolidating near highs, aiming to spot sideways price congestion within the trend.
- `rsi_overbought` High-volume stocks with a 20-Day RSI above 70, signaling potential overbought conditions and suggesting a possible trend reversal.
- `rsi_oversold` High-volume stocks with a 20-Day RSI below 30, signaling potential oversold conditions and suggesting a possible trend reversal to the upside.
- `52wk_toppicks` Stocks achieved a new 52-Week High in the current session with over 10% price change over the past month.
- `penny_gap` Penny stocks with the highest percentage change and price movements over the last 5 days.

required_parameters.name: metricType
required_parameters.description: Enter one of the following assetClass: `overview ` or `technical ` or `performance ` or `fundamental `.

api_list.name: v2/market-info
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://devapi-finance.p.rapidapi.com/v2/markets/market-info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "devapi-finance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://devapi-finance.p.rapidapi.com/v2/markets/market-info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "devapi-finance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: v1/market/quotes (snapshots)
api_list.description: Quote data for stocks, ETFs, mutual funds, etc...

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description:
Multiple symbols separated by commas. Max is 200
**Equity:** A,APPL,GM,MU,TSLA
**Futures:** ALI=F,CD=F,QM=F,^IXIC,BTC-F
**Forex:** EURUSD=X,AUDUSD=X
**Indexs:** ^DJT,^HSI,^VIX,^TRFK-TC
**Mutual Funds & ETFs:** SPY,AWSHX,VOO,XAIX.BE
**Cryptocurrencies:** BTC-USD,ETH-USD
**Combination:** APPL,CD=F,^VIX,ADA-USD

api_list.name: v2/quote (real-time)
api_list.description: Get real-time quote data for a given ticker symbol.

required_parameters.name: ticker
required_parameters.description: Enter a company ticker symbol. Example: `AAPL`

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Enter one of the following assetClass: `STOCKS` or `ETF` or `MUTUALFUNDS` or `FUTURES`.

api_list.name: v2/options

required_parameters.name: ticker
required_parameters.description: Enter a company ticker symbol. Example: `AAPL`

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Enter one of the following assetClass: `STOCKS` or `ETF` or `MUTUALFUNDS` or `FUTURES`. Example: STOCKS

optional_parameters.name: to_date
optional_parameters.description: Enter a to date. Must be greater than the **from_date**

optional_parameters.name: from_date
optional_parameters.description: Enter a from date. Must be within the current month

api_list.name: v2/stocks/historical
api_list.description: Get a company's historical data such as open, high, low and close for the past 10 years.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Enter one of the following assetClass: `STOCKS` or `ETF` or `MUTUALFUNDS` or `FUTURES`. Example: STOCKS

required_parameters.name: ticker
required_parameters.description: Enter a company ticker symbol. Example: `AAPL`

optional_parameters.name: from_date
optional_parameters.description: Enter a from date. Must be within the current month

optional_parameters.name: to_date
optional_parameters.description: Enter a to date. Must be greater than the **from_date**

api_list.name: v2/stocks/sec-filings
api_list.description: Get a company's latest filings in insider trades, annual and quarterly reports, 8-k, proxies, and registration statements.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Enter one of the following assetClass: `FORM-4` or `ALL`. Example: ALL

required_parameters.name: ticker
required_parameters.description: Enter a company ticker symbol. Example: `AAPL`

api_list.name: v2/stocks/institutional-holdings
api_list.description: Get a company's short interest, settlement date, daily volumn, and days to cover.

required_parameters.name: ticker
required_parameters.description: Enter a company ticker symbol. Example: `AAPL`

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Enter one of the following assetClass: `TOTAL`, `INCREASED`, `NEW`,  `DECREASED`, `SOLDOUT`,  `ACTIVITY`. Example: TOTAL

api_list.description: Get a company's short interest, settlement date, daily volumn, and days to cover.

required_parameters.name: ticker
required_parameters.description: Enter a company ticker symbol. Example: `AAPL`

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Enter one of the following assetClass: `STOCKS` or `ETF` or `MUTUALFUNDS` or `FUTURES`.

api_list.name: v2/stocks/revenue
api_list.description: Get a company revenue and earnings per share (EPS).

required_parameters.name: ticker
required_parameters.description: Enter a company ticker symbol. Example: `AAPL`
